content: The Stone Essence can be found at Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat. Just before the Shrine, you will see a small pathway leading into a cave. At the end of this cave, you can find the Mother of Stones. Defeating her will cause her to drop the Stone Essence.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stone_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Stone Essence'.
The content is as follows:
The Stone Essence can be found at Fright Cliff - Rockrest Flat. Just before the Shrine, you will see a small pathway leading into a cave. At the end of this cave, you can find the Mother of Stones. Defeating her will cause her to drop the Stone Essence.
